top_rss_processes.command: bash -lc  set -euo pipefail  TS=$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S) export TS OUT_JSON="data/experiment_summaries/exp_${TS}.json" export OUT_JSON  mkdir -p data/experiment_summaries paper_notes paper_results  echo "=== [0/8] Check Ollama reachable ===" python3 - <<PY import os, requests, sys host = os.getenv("OLLAMA_HOST","http://host.docker.internal:11434") try:     r = requests.get(f"{host}/api/tags", timeout=10)     r.raise_for_status()     print("Ollama OK:", host) except Exception as e:     print("ERROR: Cannot reach Ollama at", host, "\\n", e)     sys.exit(1) PY  echo "=== [1/8] Run experiment (300 total = 100 per class) ===" python3 -m src.run_experiments --per-class 100 --min-sec 10 --max-sec 30 --seed 1337 --shuffle | tee "/tmp/exp_run_${TS}.log"  echo "=== [2/8] Build bundles ===" python3 -m src.build_bundle  echo "=== [3/8] LLM triage (fills missing outputs only) ===" python3 -m src.ollama_triage  echo "=== [4/8] Baseline ===" python3 -m src.baseline  echo "=== [5/8] Eval + abstention-aware eval ===" python3 -m src.eval > "/tmp/llm_eval_${TS}.txt" python3 -m src.eval_with_abstention > "/tmp/llm_abst_${TS}.txt" python3 -m src.eval_baseline > "/tmp/base_eval_${TS}.txt"  echo "=== [6/8] Figures ===" python3 -m src.make_figures  echo "=== [7/8] Write paper notes (latest) ===" cp "/tmp/llm_abst_${TS}.txt" paper_notes/llm_abstention_latest.txt cp "/tmp/base_eval_${TS}.txt" paper_notes/baseline_latest.txt  echo "=== [8/8] Write experiment summary JSON + snapshot ===" python3 - <<PY import json, os from pathlib import Path  ts = os.environ["TS"] out_json = Path(os.environ["OUT_JSON"])  def read(p):     p = Path(p)     return p.read_text() if p.exists() else ""  summary = {   "timestamp": ts,   "command": "python3 -m src.run_experiments --per-class 100 --min-sec 10 --max-sec 30 --seed 1337 --shuffle",   "num_bundles": len(list(Path("data/bundles").glob("*.json"))),   "num_llm_outputs": len(list(Path("data/llm_outputs").glob("*.json"))),   "num_baseline_outputs": len(list(Path("data/baseline_outputs").glob("*.json"))),   "run_log_tail": read(f"/tmp/exp_run_{ts}.log")[-6000:],   "llm_eval_text": read(f"/tmp/llm_eval_{ts}.txt"),   "llm_abstention_eval_text": read(f"/tmp/llm_abst_{ts}.txt"),   "baseline_eval_text": read(f"/tmp/base_eval_{ts}.txt"),   "figures": sorted([p.name for p in Path("paper_figures").glob("*.png")]) if Path("paper_figures").exists() else [], } out_json.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True) out_json.write_text(json.dumps(summary, indent=2)) print(f"Saved summary: {out_json}") PY  SNAP="paper_results/snapshot_${TS}" mkdir -p "$SNAP" cp "$OUT_JSON" "$SNAP/" cp paper_notes/*.txt "$SNAP/" || true cp -r paper_figures "$SNAP/" 2>/dev/null || true  echo "DONE ✅  Snapshot: $SNAP"
